Class GitterificController

java.lang.Object
play.mvc.Results
play.mvc.Controller
controllers.GitterificController
All Implemented Interfaces:
play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status
public class GitterificController extends play.mvc.Controller
Contains actions to handle HTTP requests to the application
Author:
Smit Pateliya, Farheen Jamadar, Indraneel Rachakonda, Pradnya Kandarkar

    • GitterificController

      @Inject public GitterificController(controllers.AssetsFinder assetsFinder, play.cache.AsyncCacheApi asyncCacheApi, GitHubAPI gitHubAPIInst, akka.actor.ActorSystem actorSystem, akka.stream.Materializer materializer)
      Parameters:
      assetsFinder - For finding assets according to configured base path and URL base
      asyncCacheApi - For utilizing asynchronous cache
      gitHubAPIInst - Instance of GitHubAPI interface for GitHub API calls
      actorSystem - For creating actor system
      materializer - Factory for stream execution engines

  • Method Details

    • index

      public CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> index(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
      Renders an HTML page with search input form and displays the result once search query is keyed in. The configuration in the routes file means that this method will be called when the application receives a GET request with a path of /.
      Parameters:
      request - An HTTP request
      Returns:
      Future CompletionStage Result

    • ws

      public play.mvc.WebSocket ws()
      Creates a websocket, connected to the supervisor actor and returns it
      Returns:
      WebSocket for further communication with client
